div.head: 酸痹
div.div: feeling of soreness [caused by a] blockage

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: feeling of soreness [caused by a] blockage

sense.def: Illness Sign of an uncomfortable sensation of soreness. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry xuan ming fen 玄明 粉 quoting Xian jing 仙經 : 手脚酸 , “The hands and legs experience a feeling of soreness”, writes: 手脚酸痹 , “Hands and legs experience a feeling of soreness [caused by a] blockage ”.
